title: Cancel a Booking and Contract
description: A client who booked a conference six months ago is now cancelling the event.

tasks.description: Look up the client's booking and contract.
Review the cancellation clause in the contract to determine the penalty.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the contract states that cancellations within 6 months forfeit the 50% deposit.

tasks.description: Inform the client of the cancellation policy and that their deposit is non-refundable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the financial penalty for cancelling.

tasks.description: Process the cancellation, release the hold on the venue space, and close the booking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent officially cancels the event and makes the date available again.
